summary: Between 1906-1909, NYPD Lieutenant Joe Petrosino heads the 'Italian Squad' and tries to stamp out organized crime from the city, often times amid assassination attempts by the Mafia.
cast: Ernest Borgnine|Zohra Lampert|Alan Austin|Renata Vanni|Bruno Della Santina|Franco Corsaro|Robert F. Simon|Robert Ellenstein|Howard Caine|Barry Russo|Vito Scotti|John Marley|Nick Pawl|Mario Siletti|Vincent Barbi|Mimi Doyle|Sherry Alberoni|Mary Carver|Leslie Glenn|Paul Birch|Sal Armetta|David Poleri|Manuel Alda|Monya Andre|James Bacon|Margaret Bacon|Ray Beltram|Eumenio Blanco|Chet Brandenburg|Bart Braverman|Lew Brown|Sam Capuano|Larry Chance|George Chirello|Robert Christopher|Charles Cirillo|Michael Cirillo|John Close|Marian Collier|Louise Colombet|Margarita Cordova|Paul Cristo|Oliver Cross|Elvira Curci|Tony Dante|Jimmy Dime|Lester Fletcher|Charles Fox|David Fresco|Ralph Gary|Leonard Graves|Les Green|Maria Haro|Lars Hensen|Jerado|Don Kennedy|Kay Koury|Joseph La Cava|Charles La Torre|Richard LaMarr|Emily LaRue|Saverio LoMedico|John Lomma|Bert Madrid|Jerry Martin|David O. McCall|Paul McGuire|Jim Michael|King Mojave|Ernesto Molinari|Charles Morton|Norman Nazarr|Ron Nyman|Murray Pollack|Clark Ross|Gloria Ruggiero|Robert Ruggiero|Delia Salvi|Joseph Sargent|Millie Schottland|Oreste Seragnoli|Vance Skarstedt|Ida Smeraldo|Stephen Soldi|Hart Sprager|Anna Stein|Judy Strangis|Mike Tellegen|Theresa Testa|Carlo Tricoli|Lidia Vana|Francisco Villalobos|Chalky Williams|Douglas Williams|Ernesto Zambrano
title: Paga o muere
